name: Heavy orc
description: Animated heavy orc 2d game sprite with three fully animated variations and weapons. The download includes all you need to quickly and easily incorperate this game sprite into your game development project and also all the working files used to create this game character so you can easily modify and customise it to your liking. The included animations also come in key frame and png format. You will also find the spriter file used for animating and also the disceted body parts in png and svg format. I hope you have fun with this guy! Can't wait to see what you come up with!
